We are aware of the critical issue affecting the product-api service in the ap-northeast-1 region, specifically with the /api/v1/products and /api/v1/auth/login endpoints. This is resulting in a status code of 429 (Too Many Requests) and is impacting customer access to product information and login functionalities. We understand the urgency of this matter and the potential for loss of sales and user dissatisfaction. 

To assist in resolving this issue, we recommend investigating the traffic patterns and reviewing logs for any potential abuse or misconfigurations as mentioned in our knowledge base. Additionally, consider increasing resource allocation or implementing rate limiting adjustments to alleviate the current strain on the service. 

We will provide updates every hour as we work to resolve this issue. Please reply with any specific traffic patterns or logs that you can share, as this information will help us expedite our investigation. 

Thank you for your patience as we address this critical situation.
